hero.title: Passion for Exploration, Dedicated Service
hero.subtitle: Connecting you with the world - From domestic to international

timeline.title: Our Story
timeline.subtitle: From our first domestic tours to expanding into international markets, we have become a trusted bridge between Vietnamese travelers and the world.

2015.title: The Beginning of Passion
2015.description: Founded by a group of young explorers, starting with domestic and international tours to discover the beauty of the world.

2018.title: Nationwide Expansion
2018.description: Developed a network of domestic partners and launched our first international tours to Thailand and Singapore.

2020.title: Digital Transformation & Internationalization
2020.description: Launched online tour booking platform and expanded international tours to Japan, South Korea, and Europe.

2023.title: Global Partner
2023.description: Became a trusted partner with 500+ customers, serving tours to over 20 countries worldwide.

mission.title: Mission, Vision & Values
mission.subtitle: The core values that guide all our activities
mission.missionDescription: Deliver authentic, safe, and memorable travel experiences for domestic and international travelers, connecting them with the world and promoting Vietnamese culture globally.
mission.visionDescription: Become Vietnam's leading travel company, internationally recognized for service quality and sustainable tourism.

map.title: Office Location
map.description: Visit our office for direct consultation

noAnswer.title: Can't find the answer?
noAnswer.description: Contact us directly for more detailed support

1.question: How to book a tour?
1.answer: You can book tours in several ways: (1) Book online through our website - select tour, fill in information and pay online; (2) Call hotline 1900 1234 for direct consultation from professional staff; (3) Visit our office at 123 ABC Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City for detailed consultation and view more tours. We support 24/7 booking via website and hotline.

2.question: What is the tour cancellation policy?
2.answer: Tour cancellation policy depends on cancellation time: (1) Cancel 30 days before: refund 90% of total; (2) Cancel 15-29 days before: refund 70% of total; (3) Cancel 7-14 days before: refund 50% of total; (4) Cancel within 7 days: refund 20% of total. For premium and international tours, policies may differ due to partner constraints. Please read terms carefully when booking.

3.question: Do you provide visa support?
3.answer: Yes, we provide visa support services for all international tours. Services include: (1) Consult suitable visa type; (2) Prepare documents as required by consulate; (3) Schedule appointment and support interview; (4) Track processing progress. Visa fee and service fee are charged separately, ranging from 1-5 million VND depending on country. Processing time from 5-15 working days.

4.question: What payment methods are accepted?
4.answer: We accept various payment methods: (1) Cash at office; (2) Bank transfer (Vietcombank, BIDV, Techcombank); (3) Credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, JCB); (4) E-wallets (ZaloPay, VNPay); (5) Installment via credit card (0% interest for tours over 10 million). You can pay 30% when booking and 70% 7 days before departure.

5.question: Is travel insurance included?
5.answer: All our tours include basic travel insurance with coverage of 100 million VND/person, including: accidents, illness, basic luggage loss. Additionally, you can purchase premium insurance with coverage up to 1 billion VND, including: trip cancellation, flight delays, high medical costs, adventure sports. Premium insurance fee from 200,000-500,000 VND/person depending on duration and destination.

6.question: Do you organize custom tours?
6.answer: Yes, we specialize in organizing custom (private) tours according to customer requirements with advantages: (1) Flexible itinerary according to preferences; (2) Professional private guide; (3) Private transportation; (4) Choose hotels and restaurants according to budget. Minimum 4 people for domestic tours, 6 people for international tours. Custom tour prices are 20-40% higher than group tours but ensure maximum personalized experience.
